card.name: Spectrum
card.property: Energy Transformation - Forced Response: After you change to this form, choose a facedown energy form upgrade -> flip that card faceup to change to that energy form.
"The name is Monica, or Spectrum if you're nasty."

alternate.name: Monica Rambeau
alternate.property: Setup: Put all 3 energy form upgrades into play, facedown. Power Down - Forced Response: After you change to this form, turn all your energy upgrades facedown.

card.name: Gamma
card.property: Energy form. Permanent. Spectrum gets +2 ATK. Hero Response: After you change to this form, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Photon
card.property: Energy form. Permanent. Spectrum gets +2 THW. Hero Response: After you change to this form, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Pulsar
card.property: Energy form. Permanent. Spectrum gets +2 DEF. Hero Response: After you change to this form, heal 1 damage from Spectrum.

card.name: Blue Marvel
card.property: Hero Response: After Blue Marvel enters play, change energy forms
"I do whatever is right, whenever it needs to be done, and I don't care what anyone thinks."

card.name: Energy Duplication
card.property: Hero Resource: Exhaust Energy Duplication -> generate the printed resource on your faceup energy form upgrade.
"I can take the form of any type of energy I want."-Spectrum

card.name: Gamma Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Change to Gamma energy form and deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you were already in Gamma energy form, this attack gains overkill.
"I wouldn't make me angry either." - Spectrum

card.name: Photon Speed
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Change to Photon energy form and remove 4 threat from a scheme. If you were already in Photon energy form, ignore crisis icon for this thwart.
"Looking for these?" - Spectrum

card.name: Pulsar Shield
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When Spectrum defends, change to Pulsar energy form and ready Spectrum. If you were already in Pulsar energy form, she gains retaliate 1 until the end of the phase.

card.name: Speed of Light
card.property: Hero Action: Change energy forms and draw 1 card.
"Be there in a flash." - Spectrum

card.name: Captain America
card.property: Toughness. Reduce the cost to play Captain America by 1 for each [[avenger]] character you control.

card.name: Power Man
card.property: Power Man enters play with 2 chi counters on him. Action: Discard any number of chi counters from Power Man -> he gets +2 ATK for each chi counter discarded this way until the end of the phase.

card.name: White Tiger
card.property: Response: After you play White Tiger from your hand, draw X cards (to a maximum of three), where X is equal to the villain's stage number. If the villain has no stage number, draw 1 card.

card.name: Kaluu
card.property: Response: After Kaluu enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event -> add that event to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Mighty Avengers
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 Team per player. If each of your characters has the Avengers trait, each ally you control gets +1 THW and +1 ATK.

card.name: Mass Attack
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust 3 allies you control that shares a Trait with your hero -> deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the total ATK of those allies and your hero.

card.name: Band Together
card.property: This card generates [wild] for each ally you control (to a maximum of 3)

card.name: Blade
card.property: Forced Response: After Blade thwarts or attacks, choose to either spend a [physical] resource from your hand or discard Blade.

card.name: Ready to Rumble
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After you change form, discard this card -> ready your hero.

card.name: Adam Warlock
card.property: Battle Mage - Action: Discard 1 card from your hand. Limit once per phase. If that card is: -Aggression: Deal 2 damage to an enemy. -Justice: Remove 2 threat from a scheme. -Protection: Heal 1 damage from an ally. -Leadership: Give a hero +1 THW, +1 ATK and +1 DEF this round.

alternate.name: Adam Warlock
alternate.property: Avatar of Life - During deck-building, your deck must include an equal number of cards from all 4 aspects. You cannot include more than 1 copy of any non-Adam Warlock card. Action: Discard a card from your hand -> remove a status card from Adam Warlock.

card.name: Pip the Troll
card.property: Toughness. While Pip theTroll is in your hand, he gains "Interrupt: When a player is attacked, spend[energy][mental] resources -> put Pip the Troll into play under that player's controller."

card.name: Soul World
card.property: Response: After your deck runs out of cards, place 1 soul counter here. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Soul World and remove 1 soul counter from it -> heal all damage from your identity.

card.name: Karmic Staff
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Karmic Staff -> generate a [wild] resource

card.name: Warlock's Cape
card.property: Hero Response: After you resolve Adam Warlock's "Battle Mage" ability, exhaust Warlock's Cape -> ready Adam Warlock's

card.name: Cosmic Ward
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When you reveal a treachery card, cancel its "When Revealed" effects and discard it. Then, discard Cosmic Ward

card.name: Mystic Senses
card.property: Hero Response: After you resolve Adam Warlock's "Battle Mage" ability, draw 1 card.

card.name: Karmic Blast
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy and discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck -> deal 1 additional damage to that enemy for each different aspect discarded this way (Aggression, Justice, Leadership and Protection)

card.name: Cosmic Awareness
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme and discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck -> remove 1 additional threat from that scheme for each different aspect discarded this way (Aggression, Justice, Leadership and Protection)

card.name: Quantum Magic
card.property: Action: Choose a card in your discard pile -> add that card to your hand

card.name: Marvel Boy
card.property: Interrupt: When Marvel Boy attacks, spend a [physics] resource -> this attack gains piercing and ranged

card.name: In-Betweener
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to the villain and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Magic Attack
card.property: Play only if your identity has the Mystic trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Choose an enemy and discard up yo 5 cards from the top of your deck -> deal 1 damage to that enemy for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Audacity
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, deal 1 damage to the villain.

card.name: Quasar
card.property: Response: After Quasar enters play, remove 1 threat from each scheme in play.

card.name: Living Tribunal
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Remove 2 threat from the main scheme and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Zone of Silence
card.property: Play only if your identity has the Mystic trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (thwart): Choose a scheme and discard up to 4 cards from the top of your deck -> remove 1 threat from that scheme for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Determination
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, remove 1 threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Major Victory
card.property: Interrupt: When Major Victory is defeated, choose a friendly Guardian character -> ready that character.

card.name: Eternity
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Draw 1 card and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Summoning Spell
card.property: Play only if your identity has the Mystic trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an ally -> put that ally into play under your control.

card.name: Innovation
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 1 damage from an ally you control.

card.name: Charlie-27
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness.

card.name: The Gardener
card.property: Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck (without looking) When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from your identity and remove this card from the game. This effect cannot be canceled.

card.name: Shield Spell
card.property: Play only if your identity has the Mystic trait. Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, discard that many cards from the top of your deck -> prevent all damae from this attack.

card.name: Preservation
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 1 damage from your hero.

card.name: Martinex
card.property: Reduce the cost to play Martinex by 1 if your identity has the Guardian trait.

card.name: Secure the Landing Pad
card.property: Hinder 1[per_player]

card.name: Security Breach
card.property: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 2.

card.name: Save the Shawarma Place
card.property: Hinder 1[per_player]

card.name: Hack Sanctuary's Computer
card.property: Hinder 1[per_player]

card.name: Loss of Control
card.property: Give to the Monica Rambeau player. You cannot change energy forms. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Monica Rambeau -> remove Loss of Control from the game.

card.name: Radioactive Man
card.property: Forced Response: After Radioactive Man activates against you, deal 1 damage to each character you control. Forced Response: After Radioactive Man activates against you, deal 1 damage to each character you control. Boost: Deal 1 damage to each character you control.

card.name: Reactor Meltdown
card.property: When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to each friendly character in play.

card.name: Sap Power
card.property: Attach to your identity. Forced ResponseAfter your turn ends, take 1 damage. Alter-Ego Action: Spend [energy][energy] resources -> discard this card.

card.name: Radioactive Blast
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 2 threat on the main scheme. When Revealed (Hero): Take 2 damage.

card.name: Regeneration Cycle
card.property: Give to Adam Warlock player. You may flip to alter-ego. Choose: -Exhaust your alter-ego -> remove this card from the game. -Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different aspect cards discarded this way. Discard this obligation.

card.name: The Magus
card.property: Forced Response: After The magus activates against you, discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Forced Response: After The magus activates against you, discard the top 5 cards of your deck. Quickstrike. Toughness.

card.name: Universal Church of Truth
card.property: Forced Response: After a player resets their deck, exhaust that player identity and stun it. Boost: Reveal this card.

card.name: Zealot of thuth
card.property: Threat cannot be removed from the Church of thuth side scheme. Boost: Put Zealot of Truth into play engaged with you.

card.name: Cosmic Inquisition
card.property: Incite 2. When Revealed: If the Universal Church of Truth side scheme is in play, discard the top 10 cards of your deck. Otherwise, search the encouter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for Universal Church of Truth and reveal it. Shuffle the encouter deck.

card.name: Ebony Maw
card.property: [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each [[Spell]] card in your play area.
"Your powers are quaint. Let me show you real magic."

card.name: Ebony Maw
card.property: [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each [[Spell]] card in your play area. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area.

card.name: Ebony Maw
card.property: [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each [[Spell]] card in your play area. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area.

card.name: Attack on Knowhere
card.property: Contents: Ebony Maw (I) and Ebony Maw (II). (Ebony Maw (II) and Ebony Maw (III) instead for expert mode.) Ebony Maw and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter set (Armies of Titan and Black Order).
Ebony Maw leads an assault on knowhere in order to capture the Power Stone stored within.

alternate.name: Attack on Knowhere
alternate.property: When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

card.name: The Power Stone
card.property: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area.

alternate.name: The Power Stone
alternate.property: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Ebony Maw uses his powerful magic to occupy you while his agents search for the Power Stone.

card.name: Fireball
card.property: Surge. Enters play with 4 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Fireball, discard it deal 4 damage to your identity.

card.name: Manipulation
card.property: Surge. Enters play with 2 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Manipulation, discard it discard 1 card at random from your hand. You are confused.

card.name: Pacification
card.property: Surge. Enters play with 3 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Pacification, discard it exhaust each upgrade you control. You are stunned.

card.name: Rubblestorm
card.property: Surge. Enters play with 3 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Rubblestorm, discard it deal 2 damage to each character you control.

card.name: Agent of Thanos
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each [[Spell]] environment in your play area. If you place no threat this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Deal 1 damage to your hero for each [[Spell]] environment in your play area. If you take no damage this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Channeling Trance
card.property: When Revealed: Remove 1 invocation counter from each [[Spell]] environment in your play area. If you have no [[Spell]] environments in your play area, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Spell]] environment is discarded. Put that card into play in your play area.

card.name: Abjuration
card.property: Attach to Ebony Maw. Prevent all damage to Ebony Maw. Forced Response: After Abjuration prevents 2 or more damage from a single attack, discard it.

card.name: Restrained
card.property: Attach to a friendly character with the highest ATK and exhaust it. Attached character cannot ready. Hero Action: Spend [energy][physical] resources discard this card.
"Shh. That's enough from you." - Ebony Maw

card.name: Reactor Overload
card.property: When Revealed: Each player must choose to either take 2 damage or place 2 threat here.
The Maw's troops have stormed Knowhere's engine room and set the station to overload.

card.property: Hinder 1[per_player]
